name: GuruStop.NET » TweetDeck’s "Interactions" Column Is Brilliant
caption: gurustop.net
description: In Twitter’s own website, there’s now a “Connect” tab next to “Home” once you log in. In this tab, you see all the your new followers, others retweeting you, and your twitter mentions.

data.message: It is the reason why people using AIR App like TD :) .

That's very old news. Read the post, TweetDeck converted from Air to a web app shortly after Twitter acquired it. The web version sucked a lot compared to the old Air one at first, but, as I mentioned here, now it's almost as nice.
